Ross.name: ROSS Intelligence
Ross.description: As a software development intern at ROSS, my role was to build product related features which involved creating numerous microservices from scratch. Accomplishments include
accomplishments: Trained an entity recognition model to detect statute citations in legal cases
Provided event tracking on over 2000 outbound emails per month
Planned and implemented one-time use ROSS sessions
Added domain authentication to sales engagement platforms

Snaptravel.name: SnapTravel
Snaptravel.description: During my co-op at SnapTravel, I was a part of the Growth Engineering team where my role was to support the growth team by building internal tools and preparing A/B test experiments. Accomplishments include
accomplishments: Analyzed the user threat detection model’s false-positive cases
Improved the platform’s lighthouse score over 400%
Created a single interface to bid on all marketing channels
Developed a per-channel pricing tool to enable flexible hotel pricing changes
Built Google ads landing page variants for A/B testing

Tembosocial.name: TemboSocial
Tembosocial.description: At TemboSocial, I was responsible for improving the front facing product. Such tasks included
accomplishments: Implemented file attachments for email reports to improve report accessibility
Redesigned dozens of elements in the application to optimize the user experience
